biotools.summary: Progressive Object Transfer Detection | LSTD: A Low-Shot Transfer Detector for Object Detection | Specifically, SSD acts as the region proposal network (RPN) in LSTD. Additionally, we propose Transfer Knowledge (TK) and Background Depression (BD) modules for transfer detection task. More details can be found in LSTD
